{

    42
  else

class Duration {
  t1:Int
  t2:Int

  fun before(other:Duration) : Bool
  {
    t2 < other.t1
  }

  req t1 < t2
  RESULT:Int = CHECK(t1 < t2)
}

class Event {
  duration:Duration
  min:Int

  req duration.t2 - duration.t1 >= min
  RESULT:Int = CHECK(duration.t2 - duration.t1 >= min)
}

a:Event

b:Event

req a.min = 10

req b.min = 20

req a.duration.before(b.duration)

RESULT:Int = CHECK(a.min = 10 && b.min = 20 && a.duration.t2 < b.duration.t1)

ERROR:Int

fun CHECK(b:Bool) : Int
{
  if b then
    42
  else
    ERROR
}

class A {
  x:Int
  y:Int
  z:Int * Bool

  req z = Tuple(1,true)

  req z # 1 = 1 && z # 2

  fun f : Int * Bool
  {
    Tuple(1,true)
  }

  req x > 20

  req exists i : Int . i > 0 && x + i = y

  req f() # 2
  RESULT:Int = CHECK(x > 20 && y > x)
}

class B {
  sat:Bool
  z:Int
  a:A

  req a.x <= 22

  req sat

  req !sat => (z = a.x)

  fun g(l:Int) : Int
  {
    l + 1
  }

  fun f(k:Int) : Int
  {
    g(k) + 1
  }

  req f(z) <= 22

  req a.x != a.y
  RESULT:Int = CHECK(sat && a.x <= 22 && z <= 20 && a.x != a.y)
}

testsmt6.k.name: testsmt6.k
testsmt6.k.model:
ERROR:Int

req ERROR < 0

fun CHECK(b:Bool) : Int
{
  if b then
    42
  else
    ERROR
}

class Event {
  id:Int
}

class State {
  id:Int
}

class RocketMachine {
  off:State
  ready:State
  firing:State
  turn_on:Event
  fire:Event
  turn_off:Event

  req off != ready && off != firing && firing != ready

  fun move(s:State,e:Event) : State
  {
    if s = off && e = turn_on then
      ready
    else
      if s = ready && e = fire then
        firing
      else
        if s = firing && e = turn_off then
          off
        else
          s
  }

  req move(off,turn_on) = ready

  req move(ready,fire) = firing

  req move(firing,turn_off) = off
  RESULT:Int = CHECK(off != ready && off != firing && firing != ready && move(off,turn_on) = ready && move(ready,fire) = firing && move(firing,turn_off) = off)
}

testsmt3.k.name: testsmt3.k
testsmt3.k.model:
ERROR:Int

req ERROR < 0

fun CHECK(b:Bool) : Int
{
  if b then
    42
  else
    ERROR
}

class A {
  x:Int = 1
  y:Int

  fun sum : Int
  {
    x + y
  }

  req x < y
  RESULT_A:Int = CHECK(x = 1 && x < y)
}

class B extending A {
  z:Int
  a1:A
  a2:A = A(y :: 17)
  a3:A = if z > 3 then
    A(y :: z + 9)
  else
    A(y :: 33)

  req a1.y < z

  req y + 10 < z

  req sum > 10
  RESULT_B:Int = CHECK(a2.y = 17 && a3.y = z + 9 && a1.y < z && y + 10 < z && sum > 10)
}

inst1A:A = A(x :: 1,y :: 2)

inst2A:A = A(y :: 2)

inst1B:B = B(a1 :: inst1A,z :: 200)

RESULT:Int = CHECK(inst1A.x = 1 && inst1A.y = 2 && inst2A.x = 1 && inst2A.y = 2 && inst1B.a1.x = inst1A.x && inst1B.a1.y = inst1A.y && inst1B.z = 200)

testsmt9.k.name: testsmt9.k
testsmt9.k.smt:
; ================
; === Options: ===
; ================

(set-option :smt.macro-finder true)

; ===========================
; === Built-in datatypes: ===
; ===========================

(define-sort Ref () Int)

(declare-datatypes (T1 T2) ((Tuple2 (mk-Tuple2 (_1 T1)(_2 T2)))))
(declare-datatypes (T1 T2 T3) ((Tuple3 (mk-Tuple3 (_1 T1)(_2 T2)(_3 T3)))))

(define-sort Set (T) (Array T Bool))
(define-sort Bag (T) (Array T Int))

(declare-const emptySetOf_Int (Set Int))
(assert (!(forall ((x Int)) (= (select emptySetOf_Int x) false)) :named AXIOM1))

; ===============================
; === User-defined datatypes: ===
; ===============================

(declare-sort TopLevelDeclarations) (declare-const mk-TopLevelDeclarations TopLevelDeclarations)
(declare-datatypes () ((A (mk-A (x Int)))))
(declare-datatypes () ((B (mk-B (x Int)(y Int)(a Ref)))))

; =============
; === Heap: ===
; =============

(declare-datatypes () ((Any
  (lift-TopLevelDeclarations (sel-TopLevelDeclarations TopLevelDeclarations))
  (lift-A (sel-A A))
  (lift-B (sel-B B))
  null))
)

(declare-const heap (Array Ref Any))

(define-fun deref ((ref Ref)) Any
  (select heap ref)
)

; ==========================================
; === Class specific is/deref-functions: ===
; ==========================================

(define-fun deref-is-TopLevelDeclarations ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-TopLevelDeclarations (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-TopLevelDeclarations ((this Ref)) TopLevelDeclarations
  (sel-TopLevelDeclarations (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-is-A ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-A (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-A ((this Ref)) A
  (sel-A (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-is-B ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-B (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-B ((this Ref)) B
  (sel-B (deref this))
)

; ======================
; === Isa-functions: ===
; ======================

(define-fun deref-isa-TopLevelDeclarations ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-TopLevelDeclarations this)
)

(define-fun deref-isa-A ((this Ref)) Bool
  (or
    (deref-is-A this)
    (deref-is-B this)
  )
)

(define-fun deref-isa-B ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-B this)
)

; ================
; === Getters: ===
; ================

; ------------------------
;   Getters for class A:
; ------------------------

; --- getters for A.x: ---

(define-fun A.x ((this Ref)) Int
  (ite (deref-is-A this) (x (deref-A this))
  (x (deref-B this)))
)

(define-fun A!x ((this Ref)) Int
  (x (deref-A this))
)

; ------------------------
;   Getters for class B:
; ------------------------

; --- getters for B.x: ---

(define-fun B.x ((this Ref)) Int
  (x (deref-B this))
)

(define-fun B!x ((this Ref)) Int
  (x (deref-B this))
)

; --- getters for B.y: ---

(define-fun B.y ((this Ref)) Int
  (y (deref-B this))
)

(define-fun B!y ((this Ref)) Int
  (y (deref-B this))
)

; --- getters for B.a: ---

(define-fun B.a ((this Ref)) Ref
  (a (deref-B this))
)

(define-fun B!a ((this Ref)) Ref
  (a (deref-B this))
)

; ================
; === Methods: ===
; ================

; ===================
; === Invariants: ===
; ===================

; ---------------------------------------------
;   Invariant for class TopLevelDeclarations:
; ---------------------------------------------



; --------------------------
;   Invariant for class A:
; --------------------------

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-A this) (> (A!x this)  0))
) :named x360))



; --------------------------
;   Invariant for class B:
; --------------------------

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-B this) (deref-isa-A (B!a this)))
) :named x361))

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-B this) (> (B!x this)  0))
) :named x362))

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-B this) (= (B!y this)  (+ (B!x this)  1)))
) :named x363))




; ====================================
; === Object existence assertions: ===
; ====================================

(assert (!(deref-is-TopLevelDeclarations 0) :named xTOP))

(assert (!(exists ((instanceOfA Ref)) (deref-is-A instanceOfA)) :named x364))
(assert (!(exists ((instanceOfB Ref)) (deref-is-B instanceOfB)) :named x365))

testsmt8.k.smt:
; ================

(declare-datatypes () ((Person (mk-Person (age Int)))))
(declare-datatypes () ((Employee (mk-Employee (age Int)(boss Ref)(officemate Ref)))))

; =============

(declare-datatypes () ((Any
  (lift-TopLevelDeclarations (sel-TopLevelDeclarations TopLevelDeclarations))
  (lift-Person (sel-Person Person))
  (lift-Employee (sel-Employee Employee))
  null))
)

(declare-const heap (Array Ref Any))

(define-fun deref ((ref Ref)) Any
  (select heap ref)
)

; ==========================================
; === Class specific is/deref-functions: ===
; ==========================================

(define-fun deref-is-TopLevelDeclarations ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-TopLevelDeclarations (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-TopLevelDeclarations ((this Ref)) TopLevelDeclarations

(define-fun deref-Person ((this Ref)) Person

(define-fun deref-is-Employee ((this Ref)) Bool

)

)

; ======================
; === Isa-functions: ===
; ======================

(define-fun deref-isa-TopLevelDeclarations ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-TopLevelDeclarations this)
)

(define-fun deref-isa-Person ((this Ref)) Bool
  (or
    (deref-is-Person this)
    (deref-is-Employee this)
  )
)

(define-fun deref-isa-Employee ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-Employee this)
)

; ================
; === Getters: ===
; ================

; -----------------------------
;   Getters for class Person:
; -----------------------------

; --- getters for Person.age: ---

(define-fun Person.age ((this Ref)) Int
  (ite (deref-is-Person this) (age (deref-Person this))
  (age (deref-Employee this)))
)

(define-fun Person!age ((this Ref)) Int
  (age (deref-Person this))
)

; -------------------------------
;   Getters for class Employee:
; -------------------------------

; --- getters for Employee.age: ---

(define-fun Employee.age ((this Ref)) Int
  (age (deref-Employee this))
)

(define-fun Employee!age ((this Ref)) Int
  (age (deref-Employee this))
)

; --- getters for Employee.boss: ---

(define-fun Employee!boss ((this Ref)) Ref
  (boss (deref-Employee this))
)

; --- getters for Employee.officemate: ---

(define-fun Employee.officemate ((this Ref)) Ref
  (officemate (deref-Employee this))
)

(define-fun Employee!officemate ((this Ref)) Ref
  (officemate (deref-Employee this))
)

; ================
; === Methods: ===
; ================

; -----------------------------
;   Methods for class Person:
; -----------------------------

(define-fun Person.getAge ((this Ref)) Int
  (Person.age this) 
)

(define-fun Person!getAge ((this Ref)) Int
  (Person!age this) 
)

; -------------------------------
;   Methods for class Employee:
; -------------------------------

(define-fun Employee.getAge ((this Ref)) Int
  (Employee.age this) 
)

(define-fun Employee!getAge ((this Ref)) Int
  (Employee!age this) 
)

(define-fun Employee.avoid ((this Ref)(p Ref)) Bool
  (not (= (Employee.officemate this)  p))
)

(define-fun Employee!avoid ((this Ref)(p Ref)) Bool
  (not (= (Employee!officemate this)  p))
)

; ===================
; === Invariants: ===

; ---------------------------------------------

  (=> (deref-is-Employee this) (> (Employee!getAge this ) 18))
) :named x354))

  (=> (deref-is-Employee this) (> (Person.age (Employee!boss this) ) 30))

) :named x356))

testsmt7.k.smt:
; ================
; === Options: ===
; ================

(set-option :smt.macro-finder true)

; ===========================
; === Built-in datatypes: ===
; ===========================

(define-sort Ref () Int)

(declare-datatypes (T1 T2) ((Tuple2 (mk-Tuple2 (_1 T1)(_2 T2)))))
(declare-datatypes (T1 T2 T3) ((Tuple3 (mk-Tuple3 (_1 T1)(_2 T2)(_3 T3)))))

(define-sort Set (T) (Array T Bool))
(define-sort Bag (T) (Array T Int))

(declare-const emptySetOf_Int (Set Int))
(assert (!(forall ((x Int)) (= (select emptySetOf_Int x) false)) :named AXIOM1))

; ===============================
; === User-defined datatypes: ===
; ===============================

(declare-sort TopLevelDeclarations) (declare-const mk-TopLevelDeclarations TopLevelDeclarations)
(declare-datatypes () ((A (mk-A (a Int)))))
(declare-datatypes () ((B (mk-B (iA Ref)(b Int)))))
(declare-datatypes () ((C (mk-C (iA Ref)(c Int)))))
(declare-datatypes () ((D (mk-D (iB Ref)(iC Ref)(d Int)))))
(declare-datatypes () ((Master (mk-Master (d Ref)(r Int)))))

; =============
; === Heap: ===
; =============

(declare-datatypes () ((Any
  (lift-TopLevelDeclarations (sel-TopLevelDeclarations TopLevelDeclarations))
  (lift-A (sel-A A))
  (lift-B (sel-B B))
  (lift-C (sel-C C))
  (lift-D (sel-D D))
  (lift-Master (sel-Master Master))
  null))
)

(declare-const heap (Array Ref Any))

(define-fun deref ((ref Ref)) Any
  (select heap ref)
)

; ==========================================
; === Class specific is/deref-functions: ===
; ==========================================

(define-fun deref-is-TopLevelDeclarations ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-TopLevelDeclarations (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-TopLevelDeclarations ((this Ref)) TopLevelDeclarations
  (sel-TopLevelDeclarations (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-is-A ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-A (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-A ((this Ref)) A
  (sel-A (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-is-B ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-B (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-B ((this Ref)) B
  (sel-B (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-is-C ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-C (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-C ((this Ref)) C
  (sel-C (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-is-D ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-D (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-D ((this Ref)) D
  (sel-D (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-is-Master ((this Ref)) Bool
  (is-lift-Master (deref this))
)

(define-fun deref-Master ((this Ref)) Master
  (sel-Master (deref this))
)

; ======================
; === Isa-functions: ===
; ======================

(define-fun deref-isa-TopLevelDeclarations ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-TopLevelDeclarations this)
)

(define-fun deref-isa-A ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-A this)
)

(define-fun deref-isa-B ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-B this)
)

(define-fun deref-isa-C ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-C this)
)

(define-fun deref-isa-D ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-D this)
)

(define-fun deref-isa-Master ((this Ref)) Bool
  (deref-is-Master this)
)

; ================
; === Getters: ===
; ================

; ------------------------
;   Getters for class A:
; ------------------------

; --- getters for A.a: ---

(define-fun A.a ((this Ref)) Int
  (a (deref-A this))
)

(define-fun A!a ((this Ref)) Int
  (a (deref-A this))
)

; ------------------------
;   Getters for class B:
; ------------------------

; --- getters for B.iA: ---

(define-fun B.iA ((this Ref)) Ref
  (iA (deref-B this))
)

(define-fun B!iA ((this Ref)) Ref
  (iA (deref-B this))
)

; --- getters for B.b: ---

(define-fun B.b ((this Ref)) Int
  (b (deref-B this))
)

(define-fun B!b ((this Ref)) Int
  (b (deref-B this))
)

; ------------------------
;   Getters for class C:
; ------------------------

; --- getters for C.iA: ---

(define-fun C.iA ((this Ref)) Ref
  (iA (deref-C this))
)

(define-fun C!iA ((this Ref)) Ref
  (iA (deref-C this))
)

; --- getters for C.c: ---

(define-fun C.c ((this Ref)) Int
  (c (deref-C this))
)

(define-fun C!c ((this Ref)) Int
  (c (deref-C this))
)

; ------------------------
;   Getters for class D:
; ------------------------

; --- getters for D.iB: ---

(define-fun D.iB ((this Ref)) Ref
  (iB (deref-D this))
)

(define-fun D!iB ((this Ref)) Ref
  (iB (deref-D this))
)

; --- getters for D.iC: ---

(define-fun D.iC ((this Ref)) Ref
  (iC (deref-D this))
)

(define-fun D!iC ((this Ref)) Ref
  (iC (deref-D this))
)

; --- getters for D.d: ---

(define-fun D.d ((this Ref)) Int
  (d (deref-D this))
)

(define-fun D!d ((this Ref)) Int
  (d (deref-D this))
)

; -----------------------------
;   Getters for class Master:
; -----------------------------

; --- getters for Master.d: ---

(define-fun Master.d ((this Ref)) Ref
  (d (deref-Master this))
)

(define-fun Master!d ((this Ref)) Ref
  (d (deref-Master this))
)

; --- getters for Master.r: ---

(define-fun Master!r ((this Ref)) Int
  (r (deref-Master this))
)

; ================
; === Methods: ===
; ================

; ------------------------
;   Methods for class A:
; ------------------------

(define-fun A.f ((this Ref)(k Int)) Int
  (+ (A.a this)  k)
)

(define-fun A!f ((this Ref)(k Int)) Int
  (+ (A!a this)  k)
)

; ------------------------
;   Methods for class B:
; ------------------------

(define-fun B.g ((this Ref)(k Int)) Int
  (A.f (B.iA this)  (+ (+ (A.a (B.iA this) ) (B.b this) ) k))
)

(define-fun B!g ((this Ref)(k Int)) Int
  (A.f (B!iA this)  (+ (+ (A.a (B!iA this) ) (B!b this) ) k))
)

; ------------------------
;   Methods for class C:
; ------------------------

(define-fun C.h ((this Ref)(k Int)) Int
  (A.f (C.iA this)  (+ (+ (A.a (C.iA this) ) (C.c this) ) k))
)

(define-fun C!h ((this Ref)(k Int)) Int
  (A.f (C!iA this)  (+ (+ (A.a (C!iA this) ) (C!c this) ) k))
)

; ------------------------
;   Methods for class D:
; ------------------------

(define-fun D.i ((this Ref)(k Int)) Int
  (+ (+ (+ (+ (A.a (B.iA (D.iB this) )) (B.b (D.iB this) )) (C.c (D.iC this) )) (D.d this) ) k)
)

(define-fun D!i ((this Ref)(k Int)) Int
  (+ (+ (+ (+ (A.a (B.iA (D!iB this) )) (B.b (D!iB this) )) (C.c (D!iC this) )) (D!d this) ) k)
)

; -----------------------------
;   Methods for class Master:
; -----------------------------

(define-fun Master.main ((this Ref)) Int
  (+ (+ (A.f (B.iA (D.iB (Master.d this) )) 1) (B.g (D.iB (Master.d this) ) 2)) (D.i (Master.d this)  3))
)

(define-fun Master!main ((this Ref)) Int
  (+ (+ (A.f (B.iA (D.iB (Master!d this) )) 1) (B.g (D.iB (Master!d this) ) 2)) (D.i (Master!d this)  3))
)

; ===================
; === Invariants: ===
; ===================

; ---------------------------------------------
;   Invariant for class TopLevelDeclarations:
; ---------------------------------------------



; --------------------------
;   Invariant for class A:
; --------------------------

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-A this) (= (A!a this) 1))
) :named x334))



; --------------------------
;   Invariant for class B:
; --------------------------

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-B this) (= (B!b this) 2))
) :named x335))

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-B this) (deref-isa-A (B!iA this)))
) :named x336))



; --------------------------
;   Invariant for class C:
; --------------------------

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-C this) (= (C!c this) 3))
) :named x337))

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-C this) (deref-isa-A (C!iA this)))
) :named x338))



; --------------------------
;   Invariant for class D:
; --------------------------

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-D this) (= (D!d this) 4))
) :named x339))

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-D this) (deref-isa-B (D!iB this)))
) :named x340))

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-D this) (deref-isa-C (D!iC this)))
) :named x341))

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-D this) (= (B.iA (D!iB this) ) (C.iA (D!iC this) )))
) :named x342))



; -------------------------------
;   Invariant for class Master:
; -------------------------------

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-Master this) (= (Master!r this) (Master!main this) ))
) :named x343))

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-Master this) (deref-isa-D (Master!d this)))
) :named x344))

(assert (! (forall ((this Ref))
  (=> (deref-is-Master this) (= (Master!r this)  21))
) :named x345))




; ====================================
; === Object existence assertions: ===
; ====================================

(assert (!(deref-is-TopLevelDeclarations 0) :named xTOP))

(assert (!(exists ((instanceOfA Ref)) (deref-is-A instanceOfA)) :named x346))
(assert (!(exists ((instanceOfB Ref)) (deref-is-B instanceOfB)) :named x347))
(assert (!(exists ((instanceOfC Ref)) (deref-is-C instanceOfC)) :named x348))
(assert (!(exists ((instanceOfD Ref)) (deref-is-D instanceOfD)) :named x349))
(assert (!(exists ((instanceOfMaster Ref)) (deref-is-Master instanceOfMaster)) :named x350))

(declare-const emptySetOf_Int (Set Int))
(assert (!(forall ((x Int)) (= (select emptySetOf_Int x) false)) :named AXIOM1))

; ===============================

; ===============================

(declare-datatypes () ((TopLevelDeclarations (mk-TopLevelDeclarations (h Ref)))))
(declare-datatypes () ((A (mk-A (a Int)))))

; =============

(declare-datatypes () ((Any
  (lift-TopLevelDeclarations (sel-TopLevelDeclarations TopLevelDeclarations))
  (lift-A (sel-A A))
